transcript.title: ELECTION CAMPAIGN ITINERARY CANBERRA, 25TH OCTOBER, 1961
transcript.content:
.1/ 074
ELECTION CAMPAIGN ITINErARY
The Prime Minister, Mr. Menzies, today released his itinerary for
the forthcoming Federal election campaign. The itinerary is as follows:

In addition to these engagements the Prime finister will make a
number of television appearances and radio broadcasts all of which will be
seen or heard in all States.
CAN BERA, October, 1961.
